data.description: Introduction to the morphology of Oneida at the most basic level, including the interaction with, and awareness for, Ukwehuwehneha and an Oneida universal perspective. An emphasis on the development of a basic understanding of the syntactic structure of Ukwehuhwehneha and a base vocabulary. Includes the utilization of existing resources, becoming familiar with current best practices for endangered language learning, and building language proficiency.
data.title: BEGINNER LEVEL ONEIDA LANGUAGE
